input.sentences: the field trip to organization is a wonderful learning experience for all the students .
the teacher gives them direction on what 's going to be happening on their tour of this organization facility .
a organization representative shows the students a film about the location landing .
the students were given some tests to evaluate their knowledge of the space program .
the students were shown these charts and educated on the conditions the location surface .
output.sentences: Taking a trip with lots of students, all of them excited by science and planets, is fun, but challenging.
It was a very good thing that the teachers knew a lot about space and had been planning on what to say and which exhibits to see for a long time.
Even the very loudest kids were quiet when it came time to watch the video about landing on the moon.
In between the many presentations the kids took some time to regroup and express all the cool stuff they had seen with art work.
A great many different organizations took part in the presentations, offering to share their experiences with the kids.
